text:
HubDB Question:

I send out a daily newsletter of curated content to our list. At the moment, I do this using the Zapier chrome extension to send a given page to an RSS feed which then gets pulled into a HubSpot email. I want to start using HubDb to capture this and use that instead of an RSS feed. Is there some way to accomplish this? It would probably have to be using some sort of chrome extension. Here’s a loom of my process right now <https://www.loom.com/share/f43452daff8644e3be153515199de4e1>
Amazing, that's exactly what I was looking for, thanks for your help!
ah, nevermind. Pulling hubdb tables into emails requires marketing enterprise
hey guys.. i am bnot seeing a key value pair when i output a checkbox property from a crm custom object

this is what is output:
```(String: Agriculture| Forestry| Fishing and Hunting) (String: Mining| Quarrying| and Oil and Gas Extraction) (String: Utilities) (String: Construction) (String: Retail) (String: Transportation & Warehousing) (String: Finance & Insurance) (String: Professional Services) (String: Education) (String: Non-Profits) (String: Health Care)```
the data is stored in a checkbox property.
There are Names and values for every seelcted item. BUT it isnt showing the value only the Name
You’re right. Nothing I’ve tried outputs the label AND value. I can only get the value. Hopefully someone else knows the secret.
